Manual

Place the PurgaLib.dll into your C# plugin project:

LabAPI/plugins/Global

The framework will load automatically on server startup.

Installer (Linux & Windows)

Run the installer and provide the SCP:SL installation path.

Linux:
chmod +x installer.sh
./installer.sh

Windows:
Set-ExecutionPolicy -Scope CurrentUser RemoteSigned
.\installer.ps1
